overview: Jeong Tak grew up in a temple from a young age. Although he had a completely disconnected life from the world, he became an adult without much discomfort and loneliness with the care of the monks and believers who raised him. However, with age, longing for the outside world and curiosity toward women grew. Then one day, he accidentally witnessed the scene of the female believers who visited the temple, and from that day on, he set up a night sleep and tried to calm the man in himself. If you come to Seoul, Jung Tak, who is deceived by the goddesses who gave her contact information to give her a view of Seoul, is forced to come to Seoul to escape. But one by one, the world in reality, getting to know them, puts Jeongkak in an increasingly chaotic...
title: Plastic Sex
